title: Spotify New Music Update 6.3.16
body:
Huge week for new music.

Aside from new efforts from sadbois Radiohead and James Blake, our Spotify New Music update features new tracks from CitR favourites Grace Lightman, MUNA and Oyinda, alongside newcomers Elki, Future Jr. and Billy. Check out the full list of additions in the playlist below:

James Blake & Bon Iver – I Need A Forest Fire  
LUH – $ORO  
Kaytranada & Little Dragom – BULLETS  
Sundara Karma – Loveblood  
Radiohead – Burn The Witch  
Oyinda – Flatline  
Future Jr. – Tell Me That I’m Wrong  
Elle Watson – Losing Any Sleep  
Billy – Love Don’t Break Me  
Janice – Don’t Need To  
Mutual Benefit – The Hereafter  
Dua Lipa – Hotter Than Hell  
Bibi Bourelly – What If I Told You  
Mitski – Happy  
Ayelle – Back Again  
Majik – Closer  
Jordan Rakei – Talk To Me  
Marissa Nadler – Katie I Know  
Brandyn Burnette – Worship  
Elki – Sirens  
Leisure & Goldlink – Nobody  
Danny L Harle & Caroline Polachek – Ashes of Love  
Jens Kuross – Try To Follow  
Klyne – Don’t Stop  
Grace Lightman – Faultless  
Children of Pop – Jealous Lover  
VERITE – Constant Crush  
Danae – Actualized  
Jai Wolf & The Chain Gang of 1974 – Drive  
SKYES – Hold Your Fire  
MUNA – Promise  
Kehlani – 24/7
